posts.post_content: glissa is awesome, she works nicely in a modular deck, tap the mana, kill the modular creature, skeleton shard back the creature, recast it with the mana you had tapped in the first place

posts.post_content:
First strike with power 3 is not so easy to deal with. I like her as a one-off in an elf deck.
  
And with mana burn gone she improved significantly, now you can keep her ready to block and destroy opposing artifacts at the end of the opponents turn without worrying about damaging yourself.
posts.html:

Posted By: Fitchen_Kinks (4/4/2011 11:30:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Turn by turn breakdown of a deck using this card:  
  
Oh hey there [Scavenger Folk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scavenger Folk). Welcome to the artifact BOOM party. LC ain't here yet but hopefully....\*Ding Dong\*  
  
WORD UP! [Liquimetal Coating](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liquimetal Coating) whats up bro? Ya we're gonna have fun tonight. VC said he'd be her any minute, o look he's right behind you.  
  
Whats shaking [Viashino Heretic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viashino Heretic)? You ready to get down and FUNKY tonight?  
  
Oh my, and who is this lovely lady coming in behind you, man...I would tap that, I would tap that.  
  
Alright everybody, I'm gonna go check on our opponent, right after I use [Ancient Stirrings](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancient Stirrings) to call up Liquimetal's twin brother.  
  
Whats the matter opponent? You look a little sick...  
  
Hmm, maybe [Molder Beast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Molder Beast) & [Fangren Marauder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fangren Marauder) can cheer you up?
posts.html:
Turn by turn breakdown of a deck using this card:

Oh hey there Scavenger Folk. Welcome to the artifact BOOM party. LC ain't here yet but hopefully....*Ding Dong*

WORD UP! Liquimetal Coating whats up bro? Ya we're gonna have fun tonight. VC said he'd be her any minute, o look he's right behind you.

Whats shaking Viashino Heretic? You ready to get down and FUNKY tonight?

Oh my, and who is this lovely lady coming in behind you, man...I would tap that, I would tap that.

Alright everybody, I'm gonna go check on our opponent, right after I use Ancient Stirrings to call up Liquimetal's twin brother.

Whats the matter opponent? You look a little sick...

Hmm, maybe Molder Beast & Fangren Marauder can cheer you up?
